Posts.Content: I had my second AC treatment today and sucked on ice chips, so we will see. My mouth and tongue were pretty sore for 3 or 4 days the week after my first treatment. I read that popsicles or fudgsicles do the same thing -- and taste better and are more fun! Apparently you only have to suck on it during the actual infusion of Adriamycin. Good luck.
Posts.Title: Sore and dry mouth
